1.text: Evenin’, kid. Don’t see many folks workin’ this late without a badge. You keepin’ outta trouble?

options.text: 1. Depends. You on duty or just hangin’ around again?
2. You heard about the missing people?
3. Need me to make you somethin’? You look tired.
4. You still even a cop, Burke?

2.text: Always on duty. Can’t clock out when the whole town’s rottin’ from the inside. Someone’s gotta keep watch.

3.text: Yeah... bodies show up without faces. Reports vanish. No prints, no evidence. Just meat that don’t belong to anyone anymore.

4.text: Appreciate it, kid. Coffee. Black. Same as always. Gotta stay sharp. It don’t like caffeine, y’know.

5.text: Badge don’t mean much anymore. Town forgot who protects it. But I still remember... every face that went missin’.

options.text: 2. You ever find any of them?

6.text: Whoever’s left. Folks don’t talk at night anymore. Streets go quiet... and somethin’ else starts talkin’.

7.text: You call it creepy. I call it awareness. Folks disappear when they stop payin’ attention.

8.text: Sick? Yeah. World’s been sick for years. Some of us just stopped pretendin’ it ain’t terminal.

options.text: 2. You sound like you’ve seen it.

9.text: Monster? Heh. Depends who you ask. Every witness described a human. Every camera showed somethin’ else.

options.text: 2. So you’re sayin’ it could be anyone.

10.text: It listens. Hates noise. Loves silence. Loves fear even more. That’s how it picks who’s next.

11.text: Found pieces. Found tracks that led back here. But nothin’ ever leads away.

options.text: 1. Back here? You mean the drive-thru?

12.text: Static. Like a police radio with a heartbeat. Sometimes it says my name, but it ain’t my voice.

options.text: 2. What does it want from you?

13.text: All I’ll say is... it wore a smile wrong. Like it practiced in a mirror and never got it right.

options.text: 2. Are you sure it wasn’t human?

14.text: Anyone. Everyone. Maybe even me. Don’t stay too long out here, kid.

15.text: You think those fryers just hiss when oil’s hot? I’ve heard ‘em whisper. ‘Serve him next.’

16.text: Whatever’s hungry. Whatever’s still waitin’. You feel it too, don’t you? Behind the window.
